marklogic.body: Hi Larry - thanks for this "day in the life" transpo snapshot :-) Question for ya - what motor and are you using on the Dahon folding bike? I want to add a small & lightweight electric kit to my folder, so am Glad to know you have a kit that adds only 8 pounds to your bike. Specifically -- is this kit powerful enough to assist you up steep hills, without Overheating the motor? And how wide is the hub motor? Brand names, and where can I buy this? Thanks again!
